maqras.text: 25|21|Kasone, ki ʙa didori Mo [dar oxirat] umed nadorand, guftand: «Caro faristagone ʙar mo nozil nasudaand, jo [caro] Parvardigoramonro nameʙinem»? Be tardid, onon dar ʙorai xud takaʙʙur varzidand va sarkasii ʙuzurg kardand
25|22|Ruze, ki [kofiron] faristagonro meʙinand, hec ʙasorate ʙaroi mucrimon naxohad ʙud, [ʙalki ruzi kajfaru azoʙ ast] va [faristagon] megujand: «[Bihist] Bar sumo mamnu' [va harom] ast»
25|23|Va ʙa [ʙarrasii] korhojason mepardozem va hamaro [hamcun] ƣuʙore parokanda mesozem
25|24|Dar on ruz ʙihistijon ʙehtarin cojgohu nakutarin istirohatgohro dorand
25|25|Va [jod kun az] ruze, ki osmon ʙo aʙrhoi saped sikofta mesavad va faristagon [pajopaj ʙa sarzamini mahsar] furu firistoda mesavand
25|26|Dar on ruz farmonravoi [-i rostin] az oni [Allohi] Rahmon ast va ʙaroi kofiron ruze dusvor ast
25|27|Va [jod kun az] ruze, ki sitamgor dastonasro [az hasrat] megazad va megujad: «Ej kos, man rohe [hamohang] ʙo pajomʙar ʙarguzida ʙudam
25|28|Ej voj ʙar man! Ej kos, falon [kofir]-ro ʙa dusti namegiriftam
25|29|Be tardid, pas az on ki Qur'on [va da'vati pajomʙar] ʙa man rasid, u [ʙud, ki] maro ʙa gumrohi kasond va sajton hamvora insonro tanho [va xor] vomeguzorad»
25|30|Va Pajomʙar guft: «Parvardigoro, qavmi man in Qur'onro raho kardaand»
25|31|Va incunin ʙaroi har pajomʙare dusmane az ʙadkoroni [qavmas] qaror dodem. Va kofi ast, ki Parvardigorat rohnamo va jovarat ʙosad

25|32|Va kasone, ki kufr varzidand, guftand: «Caro Qur'on jakʙora ʙar u nozil nasudaast?» Mo in guna [kalomi ilohiro ʙa murur nozil] kardaem, to dilatro ʙo on [orom va] ustuvor gardonem va onro ʙa tadric ʙar tu xondaem [to darku hifzas oson ʙosad]
25|33|Va [kofiron] hec [e'tirozu] masale ʙarojat nameovarand, magar on ki Mo [niz posuxe] ʙar haq va xusʙajontar ʙarojat meovarem
25|34|Kasone, ki ʙa ruj daraftoda ʙa duzax kasonda mesavand, inon ʙadcojgohtar va gumrohtarand
25|35|Va dar haqiqat, Mo ʙa Muso kitoʙ [Tavrot] dodem va ʙarodaras Horunro dastjoras soxtem
25|36|Va guftem: «Sumo du nafar ʙa sui qavme ʙiraved, ki ojoti Moro duruƣ angostand». Pas, [cun fir'avnijon sarpeci namudand] ʙa siddat noʙudason soxtem
25|37|Va qavmi Nuhro – on goh ki pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand – ƣarq kardem va ononro ʙaroi mardum [nisona va] iʙrate qaror dodem; va ʙaroi sitamgoron azoʙe dardnok muhajjo kardaem
25|38|Va [hamcunin] qavmi Od va Samud va aholii "coh" va naslhoi ʙisjorero, ki ʙajni onon ʙudand [noʙud soxtem]
25|39|Va ʙaroi har jak az onho masalho zadem va [cun pand nagiriftand] hamaro ʙa siddat az mijon ʙurdem

25|40|Va [musrikon] hatman, az [sarzamini qavmi Lut hamon] sahre, ki ʙoroni ʙalo ʙar on ʙorida ʙud, guzar kardaand. Ojo on [vajronahoi ʙoqimonda az azoʙ] -ro nadidaand? [Cunin nest] Balki ʙa zinda sudan [pas az marg] umede nadorand
25|41|Va hangome ki turo meʙinand, faqta ʙa tamasxur megirand [va megujand] «Ojo in hamon kasest, ki Alloh taolo ʙa pajomʙari firistodaast

25|42|Agar ʙar [parastisi] ma'ʙudonamon [sikeʙoi va] pojdori namekardem, nazdik ʙud [Muhammad] az [rohi] onho gumrohamon kunad». Vale on goh ki azoʙ [-i ilohi]-ro ʙuʙinand, xohand donist ci kase gumrohtar [ʙuda] ast
25|43|Ojo kase, ki havoi nafsasro ma'ʙudi xud kardaast, didai? Ojo tu [metavoni] nigahʙoni [imoni] u ʙosi
25|44|Ojo gumon dori, ki ʙestarason mesunavand jo mefahmand? Onon cuz hammonandi cahorpojon nestand, ʙalki gumrohtarand

25|45|Ojo [ofarinisi] Parvardigoratro nadidai, ki ci guna sojaro gustaronidaast va agar mexost, onro soʙit menamud? On goh [taƣjiri cojgohi] xursed [nisʙat ʙa zamin]-ro daleli [gustarisu harakati] on [soja] qaror dodem
25|46|Sipas [ʙo taƣjiri ʙalandii xursed sojaro kutoh mekunem va] onro andak-andak ʙa suji xes ʙozmegirem
25|47|Va Ust, ki saʙro [ʙo torikii farogiras] pusise ʙaroi sumo qaror dod va xoʙro mojai osois va ruzro hangomi ʙarxostan [va koru talos] soxt
25|48|Va Ust, ki pes az [ʙoroni] rahmatas ʙodhoro ʙasoratʙaxs firistod va az osmon oʙe pok [va pokkunanda] furu firistodem
25|49|To ʙo on sarzamini [xusku] murdaro zinda gardonem va cahorpojon va insonhoi ʙisjorero, ki ofaridaem, seroʙ sozem
25|50|Va ʙa rosti, on [daloilu nisonahoi qudrati ilohi]-ro ʙa surathoi gunogun ʙajon kardem, to pand girand, vale ʙestar mardum cuz [inkoru] nosiposi nakardand
25|51|Va agar mexostem, dar har dijore ʙimdihandae ʙarmeangextem
25|52|Pas, [ej pajomʙar] az kofiron itoat nakun va ʙa vasilai Qur'on ʙo onon ʙa cihodi ʙuzurge ʙarxez [va dar in roh sikeʙo ʙos]
